meta.content: Putnam County R-I Schools - Middle Years Newsletter: COVID-19 Edition

meta.title: Putnam County R-I Schools - Middle Years Newsletter: COVID-19 Edition

div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 07:55 am CDT

div.div: Partly sunny, with a high near 73. South southwest wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 11pm, then a slight chance of showers between 11pm and midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 49. South wind 5 to 9 mph becoming calm in the evening. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming sunny, with a high near 68. Calm wind becoming north 5 to 7 mph in the morning.

div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 07:55 am CDT

div.div: Partly sunny, with a high near 73. South southwest wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 11pm, then a slight chance of showers between 11pm and midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 49. South wind 5 to 9 mph becoming calm in the evening. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming sunny, with a high near 68. Calm wind becoming north 5 to 7 mph in the morning.
